text: @realDonaldTrump Hey Trump; you don’t give a rat ass about the 100,000 people who died from the Coronavirus, do you?  You are so pathetic as a President.  I have friends and family who died in this pandemic.  100,000 souls, may they Rest In Peace.  Damn shameful!
